tools.name: forecast_demand
tools.description: Generate demand forecast for products based on historical data and patterns. JSON body: {product_id, timeframe, include_seasonality?}.

tools.name: analyze_demand_patterns
tools.description: Analyze historical demand patterns and trends for products. JSON body: {product_id?, analysis_type?}.

tools.name: detect_demand_surge
tools.description: Detect unusual demand patterns and surges in recent orders. JSON body: {time_window?, sensitivity?}.
